ps1.6:1.1: Gatisampattiya nanasampayutte katinam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:1.2: Khattiyamahasalanam brahmanamahasalanam gahapatimahasalanam kamavacaranam devanam nanasampayutte katinam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:1.3: Rupavacaranam devanam katinam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:1.4: Arupavacaranam devanam katinam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:2.1: Gatisampattiya nanasampayutte atthannam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:2.2: Khattiyamahasalanam brahmanamahasalanam gahapatimahasalanam kamavacaranam devanam nanasampayutte atthannam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:2.3: Rupavacaranam devanam atthannam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:2.4: Arupavacaranam devanam atthannam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:3.1: Gatisampattiya nanasampayutte katamesam atthannam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:4.1: Patisandhikkhane pancakkhandha sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, vippayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:4.2: Patisandhikkhane cattaro mahabhuta sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:4.3: Patisandhikkhane tayo jivitasankhara sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, vippayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:4.4: Patisandhikkhane namanca rupanca sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, vippayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:4.5: Patisandhikkhane ime cuddasa dhamma sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, vippayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:4.6: Patisandhikkhane cattaro khandha arupino sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:4.7: Patisandhikkhane pancindriyani sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:4.8: Patisandhikkhane tayo hetu sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:4.9: Patisandhikkhane namanca vinnananca sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:4.10: Patisandhikkhane ime cuddasa dhamma sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:4.11: Patisandhikkhane ime atthavisati dhamma sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, vippayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:4.12: Gatisampattiya nanasampayutte imesam atthannam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:5.1: Khattiyamahasalanam brahmanamahasalanam gahapatimahasalanam kamavacaranam devanam nanasampayutte katamesam atthannam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:6.10: Patisandhikkhane ime cuddasa dhamma sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:6.11: Patisandhikkhane ime atthavisati dhamma sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, vippayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:6.12: Khattiyamahasalanam brahmanamahasalanam gahapatimahasalanam kamavacaranam devanam nanasampayutte imesam atthannam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:7.1: Rupavacaranam devanam katamesam atthannam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:7.3: rupavacaranam devanam imesam atthannam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:9.1: Patisandhikkhane cattaro khandha arupino sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:9.2: Patisandhikkhane pancindriyani sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.

ps1.6:9.5: Patisandhikkhane ime cuddasa dhamma sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:9.6: Arupavacaranam devanam imesam atthannam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:10.1: Gatisampattiya nanavippayutte katinam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:10.2: Khattiyamahasalanam brahmanamahasalanam gahapatimahasalanam kamavacaranam devanam nanavippayutte katinam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:11.1: Gatisampattiya nanavippayutte channam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:11.2: Khattiyamahasalanam brahmanamahasalanam gahapatimahasalanam kamavacaranam devanam nanavippayutte channam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:12.1: Gatisampattiya nanavippayutte katamesam channam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:13.1: Patisandhikkhane pancakkhandha sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, vippayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:13.2: Patisandhikkhane cattaro mahabhuta sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:13.3: Patisandhikkhane tayo jivitasankhara sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, vippayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:13.4: Patisandhikkhane namanca rupanca sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, vippayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:13.5: Patisandhikkhane ime cuddasa dhamma sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, vippayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:13.6: Patisandhikkhane cattaro khandha arupino sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:13.7: Patisandhikkhane cattari indriyani sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:13.8: Patisandhikkhane dve hetu sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:13.9: Patisandhikkhane namanca vinnananca sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:13.10: Patisandhikkhane ime dvadasa dhamma sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:13.11: Patisandhikkhane ime chabbisati dhamma sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, vippayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.6:13.12: Gatisampattiya nanavippayutte imesam channam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti.
ps1.6:14.1: Khattiyamahasalanam brahmanamahasalanam gahapatimahasalanam kamavacaranam devanam nanavippayutte katamesam channam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti?
ps1.6:14.6: khattiyamahasalanam brahmanamahasalanam gahapatimahasalanam kamavacaranam devanam nanavippayutte imesam channam hetunam paccaya upapatti hoti”ti.
